sentences.en: "Perhaps you could check the book?" Moira said helpfully.
sentences.cn: “也许你可以查一下书？”莫伊拉建议道。

sentences.en: A first rule in solving any mystery is to check the facts.
sentences.cn: 揭开谜团的第一条规则是核查事实。

sentences.en: a way of keeping inflation in check.
sentences.cn: 控制通货膨胀的方法。

sentences.en: Can I have the check, please?
sentences.cn: 请把账单给我好吗？

sentences.en: Can I pay by check?
sentences.cn: 我可以用支票付款吗？

sentences.en: Can you cash this check for me?
sentences.cn: 您可以为我兑现这张支票吗?。

sentences.en: Can you cash this check for me?
sentences.cn: 你可以为我兑现这张支票吗?。

sentences.en: Check joints are secure and the wood is sound.
sentences.cn: 检查一下连接处是否稳固及木料是否结实。

sentences.en: check out books.
sentences.cn: 借出书籍

sentences.en: Check the actual construction of the chair by looking underneath.
sentences.cn: 看看椅子的下面，检查一下它的实际构造。

sentences.en: Check the tiles carefully before you buy them.
sentences.cn: 购买之前要把瓷砖仔细检查一下。

sentences.en: Check us in at the hotel and wait for my call.
sentences.cn: 去宾馆替我们办理好入住手续，然后等我的电话。

sentences.en: Check whether you are entitled to a discretionary grant for your course.
sentences.cn: 确定你是否有权酌情行事。

sentences.en: Conduct regular checks on your water quality.
sentences.cn: 要经常检查水质。

sentences.en: Fill in the cash book carefully and always check your calculations.
sentences.cn: 仔细填写现金账簿，每次都要检查计算结果。

sentences.en: He grinned, and then checked himself, not wanting to upset Jack.
sentences.cn: 他咧嘴一笑，然后克制住自己，因为他不想让杰克不开心。

sentences.en: He had gone to the reception desk, presumably to check out.
sentences.cn: 他已经去前台了，可能是要办理退房手续。

sentences.en: I faxed 10 hotels in the area to check room size.
sentences.cn: 我给该地区10家旅馆发了传真，核实房间大小。

sentences.en: I had to check the urge to laugh out loud.
sentences.cn: 我只得憋住不让自己大声笑出来。

sentences.en: I think there is an age limit, but I'd have to check.
sentences.cn: 我觉得有年龄限制，不过我得去核实一下。

sentences.en: I'd like to check the balance in my account please.
sentences.cn: 请查一下我的账户余额。

sentences.en: I'll ring the hotel. I'll tell them we'll check in tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我来给旅馆打电话，通知他们我们明天入住。

sentences.en: keep a regular check on your score.
sentences.cn: 对你的积分定期查一下。

sentences.en: Make a note of credit card numbers and check expiry dates.
sentences.cn: 记下信用卡卡号，核对有效期限。

sentences.en: Positive test results are double-checked (= looked at twice ) to make absolutely sure.
sentences.cn: 对呈阳性的化验结果要进行复查，以确保绝对准确。

sentences.en: She wheeled sharply and headed for the check-out counter.
sentences.cn: 她突然转身，朝收银台走去。

sentences.en: Someone comes in every day to check all is in order.
sentences.cn: 每天都有人来检查是否一切都井然有序。

sentences.en: The cashier checked out and bagged my order.
sentences.cn: 收款员计价收款并给我包装了商品

sentences.en: The city police set up roadblocks to check passing vehicles.
sentences.cn: 该市警察设置了路障以检查过往车辆。

sentences.en: the doctor had come to check on his patient.
sentences.cn: 医生已来检查过病人。

sentences.en: The police are failing to take adequate measures to check the growth in crime.
sentences.cn: 警方未能采取适当的措施来阻止犯罪率上升。

sentences.en: The teacher checked the students' papers over.
sentences.cn: 老师仔细查看了学生们的试卷

sentences.en: they check in the passengers.
sentences.cn: 他们为乘客办理登机手续。

sentences.en: they decided to go and check out a local restaurant.
sentences.cn: 他们决定去一家当地餐馆尝尝口味。

sentences.en: They would go out on his route and check him.
sentences.cn: 他们会到他那里走访一下，看看他的情况。

sentences.en: you must check in at least one hour before take-off.
sentences.cn: 你必须在起飞前至少一小时办理登机手续。

words.tran_cn: 检验员；收银员；棋子；方格图案；制止者
检查（check的过去式和过去分词）
把…画成棋盘形方格图案；使多样化

phrases.phrase: check in ( 或 check someone in)
phrases.tran_cn: （到旅馆或机场）登记，入住，到达
收款：零售商店中对所购商品的记录、计价及收款
(主北美)（将货物价格输入超市收银机相加）计算出（顾客）应付款
(南非)向某人（某物）不满地看一看
在表上列项处打钩（或作记号）
(棋)（王）被将军；（棋手的）王被将军

trans.tran_cn: 检查，账单，支票，调查，阻碍，条令，约束，记号，方格图案，存放处/牌，（国际象棋）将军
trans.tran_en: something that controls something else and stops it from getting worse, continuing to happen etc

trans.tran_cn: 检查，查看，核实，控制，抑制，克制，存放，在…上打钩，托运
trans.tran_en: to do something in order to find out whether something really is correct, true, or in good condition
to do something in order to find out whether something really is correct, true, or in good condition
